#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    while(t--)
    {
        char a[11],b[10];
        cin >> a >> b;
        if(strstr(a,b)==0)
            printf("0\n");
        else
            printf("1\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
